mathematica: f[z_] := Sqrt[5*z^2 - 6*z + 1]; g[z_] := (2*(1 - z^2) - (1-z)*f[z] - f[z^2])/ (4*(1-z)); Drop[ CoefficientList[ Series[ g[z], {z, 0, 24}], z], 1] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 13 2011, after Emeric Deutsch *)
